sentences.en: COUNTESS: ( putting her hands on her shoulders to comfort her ) My dear, you're ill.
sentences.cn: 安妮: 我不管溢不溢出来.

sentences.en: Countess: I rejoice to say I do not.
sentences.cn: 女伯爵: 我很兴奋地说我不是这样的.

sentences.en: Countess: My dear, you have lovely things.
sentences.cn: 女伯爵: 亲爱的, 你有一些可爱的东西.

sentences.en: He looked disappointed, and said he didn't remember the countess.
sentences.cn: 他好像是大失所望, 说他 想 不起这位伯爵小姐了.

sentences.en: Recent days in the media spotlight have been a trial for the countess.
sentences.cn: 最近几天媒体的关注对苏菲王妃来说是一场考验.

sentences.en: Rubinstein now headed for Japan, taking for companionship: a Hungarian charmer who called herself Countess Natasha.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾斯坦于是首途赴日, 带了一位自称是娜妲霞女伯爵的匈牙利妖姬同行.

sentences.en: The Chinese - tennis team made a corporate effort to win countess championships.
sentences.cn: 中国乒乓球队通过集体的共同努力赢得了无数次冠军.

sentences.en: You'll come to the fancy dress ball, countess?
sentences.cn: 伯爵小姐,您会出席化装赛会 吧 ?

trans.tran_en: a woman with the same rank as an  earl  or a  count 2 9
